instructions: In a large bowl, combine yogurt, pineapple, and pudding mix. Spoon into pie crust. Cover and freeze at least 6 hours, or until firm. Drizzle with chocolate syrup before serving.
ingredients: 1 (1 ounce) package sugar-free instant pistachio pudding mix
1 (9 inch) chocolate cookie crumb pie crust
title: Pistachio-Pineapple Yogurt Pie
